h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
content: Black Myth: Wukong is full of secrets, and you’ll quickly learn that backtracking and revisiting previous places and even Chapters is essential if you want to experience everything. Missing an entry from your notebook or have a feeling that a place holds a secret? It’s always worth returning to explore again, particularly after you’ve gained new key items.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '9\. It Pays to Backtrack'.
The content is as follows:
Black Myth: Wukong is full of secrets, and you’ll quickly learn that backtracking and revisiting previous places and even Chapters is essential if you want to experience everything. Missing an entry from your notebook or have a feeling that a place holds a secret? It’s always worth returning to explore again, particularly after you’ve gained new key items.
